title: Desecration
alt: It gets worse! You know that wizened old monk with the gypsy wife whose voodoo shop we smash up every day after school?
transcript:
[Megan running towards Rob.]
Megan: ROB! ROB!
Rob: You look terrified! What's wrong?
Megan: We've made a huge mistake![Both standing in place, Megan has hands up in an explaining gesture.]
Megan: Remember last week when we dug up all those Indian bones and made puppets out of them?
Rob: Sure...[Megan is throwing her arms out.]
Megan: It turns out they were buried over an ancient Indian burial ground!
Rob: Oh my God!
